CRO CLI Code Generator.subtitle: CLI Tool
CRO CLI Code Generator.blurb: This CLI tool is used to generate A/B testing code based on information given through the CLI. The tool also watches for changes and exports code into a copy-pastable format for the dev tools console.

Med Tool.subtitle: ReactJS Mini-Project
Med Tool.blurb: I wanted to create a tool that helped me figure out a good schedule for giving meds to my pets following any surgeries they might have. This page does that, and exports the table as an image.

link.alt: Link to the Med Tool on this site.

DBD Killer Voting App.subtitle: Windows app + Twitch bot
DBD Killer Voting App.blurb: This app combines a Twitch chat bot with a Windows desktop app to help a fellow Twitch streamer streamline a giveaway voting system he uses while playing Dead by Daylight.

link.alt: Link to GitHub repository for DBD Killer Voting App

Tierator.subtitle: Vue.js Website
Tierator.blurb: This is my first Vue.js project; it's a tier creator. Due to server costs, it is not currently live.

link.alt: Link to GitHub repository for Tierator website

This Website :).subtitle: NextJS Website
This Website :).blurb: This is Version 3 of this site, finally fully in ReactJS (specificially NextJS)! This version uses the same design from V2, but offers cleaner code and better functionality.

link.alt: Link to GitHub repository for this website

Fiddlesitters Website.subtitle: NextJS Website
Fiddlesitters Website.blurb: A work-in-progress hub for a Twitch stream team, this site was built using React & NextJS. This was also a playground for an interactive team game using MySQL. Due to server costs, it is not currently live.

link.alt: Link to GitHub repository for Fiddlesitters website

Jackbox Spinner Wheel.subtitle: HTML/JS/CSS Mini-Project
Jackbox Spinner Wheel.blurb: My friends and I were often unable to decide which Jackbox game to play, so I threw the games into a wheel we can spin. ReactJS updates are here! You can now add/remove games from the wheel.

Why Is My Cat So Jacked.subtitle: React Native App
Why Is My Cat So Jacked.blurb: This is my first attempt at building a React Native app. I built it over a weekend back in November 2022. Due to server costs, it is not currently live.

link.alt: Link to GitHub repository for this website

Time Conversion Calculator.subtitle: HTML/JS/CSS Mini-Project
Time Conversion Calculator.blurb: In CRO, time zones & DST for scheduling A/B tests can be confusing. I built a calculator to do the time zone / DST math for us. The below link contains a TypeScript version.

Voyage of the Dead.subtitle: Video Game by Gaming Corps
Voyage of the Dead.blurb: This video game featured light gun peripherals, which made it an extremely unique development process. As Dev Support, I programmed the Kraken boss fight, lobby fidgets, and other combat encounters, in addition to managing the QA process.

link.alt: link to article about game release

American Ninja Warrior Challenge.subtitle: Video Game by Gaming Corps
American Ninja Warrior Challenge.blurb: My role for this video game project was primarily focused on testing console builds. I occasionally supported other parts of the development and design process, including assisting with set decoration.

link.alt: link to article about game release

Guildie Bot.subtitle: 1st Code Project - Discord Bot
Guildie Bot.blurb: Guildie Bot was my vehicle for learning JavaScript and MySQL. Originally designed simply to welcome new members into a Discord server, Guildie Bot grew into a full, text-based adventure game with the support of an AWS database.

link.alt: Link to Bitbucket repository for Guildie Bot

Catra, Adora, Dina, & Ellie Bots.subtitle: Discord Bots
Catra, Adora, Dina, & Ellie Bots.blurb: Based on characters from She-Ra and the Last of Us II, these bots work together to manage member roles and other various functions for my current public and private Discord servers.

link.alt: Link to Bitbucket repository for Dina, Ellie, Catra, and Adora bots

Guild of Geeks Website.subtitle: WordPress Site
Guild of Geeks Website.blurb: This site was the main hub of information for my non-profit organization, focusing especially on sharing upcoming events to help the organization grow in the local community. The organization and site ended in 2020.

link.alt: Link to Bitbucket repository for Guild of Geeks website
